gov.nih.nlm.meme.common
Interface ReportStyle

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReportStyle.Default
public interface ReportStyle

Generically represents a style which is to be applied to an HTML or enscript-enabled concept report. Typically this kind of style is used to highlight some section of the report where lines match a particular regular expression. The actual style can consist of a background shading, a color, or bold, underlined, or italicized text.

Author:
MEME Group
See Also:
ReportsClient, ReportsGenerator

Nested Class Summary
static class ReportStyle.Default
          This inner class serves as a default implementation of the ReportStyle interface.

getStartTag

public String getStartTag(String line)
Returns formatting start tags based on lines of the report. When processing a report, this method is called before each line is written out to apply style tags to the line.

Parameters:
line - line to be written to apply tags.
Returns:
the start tag.

getEndTag

public String getEndTag()
Returns the formatting end tags. This method only returns a value if the start tag method returned a value.

Returns:
the end tag.
